definitions: The action of drawing air audibly up the nose to detect a smell, to express disdain, or to stop a runny nose.
The action of smelling something by sniffing.
The act of investigating or searching for something, often surreptitiously.
examples: The dog was sniffing at the base of the tree.
She was sniffing back tears during the sad movie.
He spent the afternoon sniffing around for clues.
